# This .gitignore file should be placed at the root of your Unity project

[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/
[Mm]emoryCaptures/

# Asset meta data should only be ignored when the corresponding asset is also ignored
!/[Aa]ssets/**/*.meta

# Visual Studio / Rider / VS Code
.vs/
.vscode/
.idea/
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.tmp
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj

# Unity3D generated meta files
*.pidb.meta
*.pdb.meta

# Unity3D generated files
*.mdb
*.opendb
*.db

# Crash reports
sysinfo.txt

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
